import time
from app.auth.roles import checkPermission
from app.safety.guards import panicLock, chaosLimiter
from app.utils.logger import logEvent

async def executeAgent(agentName, action, userId, context):
    if not checkPermission(userId, "execute_agent"):
        raise PermissionError("Permission Denied")

    if not panicLock.is_safe() or not chaosLimiter.check():
        raise RuntimeError("Safety lock prevents execution")

    start = time.time()
    try:
        agent = get_agent_by_name(agentName)
        result = await agent.perform_action(action, userId, context)
    except Exception as e:
        fallback = getattr(agent, "onFail", None)
        if fallback:
            result = await fallback(e, userId, context)
        else:
            raise
    duration_ms = (time.time() - start) * 1000
    await logEvent({
        "userId": userId,
        "agentName": agentName,
        "action": action,
        "latencyMs": duration_ms,
        "source": "executeAgent",
        "result.status": result.get("status", "unknown"),
    })
    return result

from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String, DateTime, JSON, ForeignKey
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
import datetime

Base = declarative_base()

class Scan(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'scans'
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    timestamp = Column(DateTime, default=datetime.datetime.utcnow)
    trend_triggers = Column(JSON)
    viral_heat_index = Column(Integer)
    actions = Column(JSON)

class Drop(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'drops'
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    drop_type = Column(String)
    scheduled_time = Column(DateTime)
    priority = Column(Integer)
    status = Column(String, default='scheduled')

class Log(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'logs'
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    event_type = Column(String)
    user_id = Column(String)
    details = Column(JSON)
    timestamp = Column(DateTime,default=datetime.datetime.utcnow)

class Content(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'content'
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    scored_tags = Column(JSON)
    status = Column(String)

class User(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'users'
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
